charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was taking a walk in
the mountains when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] came across Chuck, who
was in the middle of a training session.
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_1201_020:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Did you come
here to train too?
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_1201_030:
All right! Then why don’t you train with me for a
while before you go?
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_1201_040: ...What’s that? What kind of training am I doing?
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_1201_050:
I’ve been smashing boulders, enduring the
pounding rush of the waterfall! Things like that!
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_1201_060: I train like this every day!
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_0401_080:
That’s right! ...Well, to be honest, it’s not JUST
about Pokémon battles.
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_0402_100:
I can’t be a very good example for my Pokémon if
I’m not strong myself, right?
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_1201_110:
Strict and consistent training is the secret to my
strength!
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_1201_120:
But recently I’ve been training with a different
goal in mind.
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_1201_130:
I noticed that my gut’s been looking a little
pudgier lately...
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_1201_140: So I’m working hard to stay fit with my training!
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_1201_150:
Back in Johto, I was constantly training under the
waterfall in the Gym...
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_1201_160:
but I’d always follow up training with lots of
snacks, so my belly never really changed.
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_1201_170:
When I came to Pasio, I thought I’d start fresh!
I’ve been training more vigorously than ever along
with Poliwrath here!
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_1201_190:
Swimming is one of Poliwrath’s strengths, so I
added it to our training routine.
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_1201_200:
Someday we may even be able to swim up the
waterfall!
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_1201_210:
...Wahahah! I guess that may be a little too
ambitious!
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_1201_220:
But if I keep up this pace, it ought to do more
than just tighten up my belly.
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_1201_230:
It may also shape my whole body into a great big
mass of muscle, just like Poliwrath!
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_1201_240:
Did you know that there’s almost no fat in
Poliwrath’s body? His whole body is made of
muscle!
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_1201_250:
He’s not just my partner—he’s got the ideal body
type that I strive for!
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_1201_260:
By the way, not to change the subject,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_1201_270:
but are there any sweets here on Pasio that you’d
recommend?
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_0401_290: Well, I can’t do anything on an empty stomach!
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_0402_310: Wahahah! Just a few! That’s all!
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_1201_320:
After such rigorous training, I always get the urge
to eat something sweet! Poliwrath and I have been
making our way through all the shops on Pasio!
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_1201_330:
There’s nothing better than the taste of sweets to
soothe a tired body!
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_1201_340:
Depriving yourself of what you love is no good for
your body or your mind!
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_1201_350:
You just have to make sure to work out as much
as you eat! Wahahah!
charaepi_ch0171_00_shijima/2301_1201_360:
Like with me! I’ve definitely been training enough
to balance out what I eat. At least...I thought so?
